message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to your work, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. I'm asking for $950,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was hoping to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to my work.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your position, the value of this product is quite high, and $950,000 is already a competitive offer. Could you meet me halfway at $900,000?

I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $850,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I can offer $875,000. I believe this is a fair compromise.
